translations: n．祖母（复数）：母亲的母亲或父亲的母亲。
· Both of my grandmothers are still alive.
我的两位祖母都还健在。

sentences.translation: 我的祖母和外祖母都是寡妇。

sentences.sentence: Even if we have time, not many of us take the effort to collect and record the recipes from our grandmothers and parents.
sentences.translation: 即使我们有时间，也没有多少人会花精力去收集和记录我们祖母和父母的食谱。

sentences.sentence: At the starting line of their careers, they are better educated than their mothers and grandmothers had been—or than their young male counterparts are now.
sentences.translation: 当她们位于职业生涯的起跑线上时，她们受到的教育要比她们的母亲和祖母当年接受的更好——或比同龄的年轻男性现有的受教育程度要更高。
